PROMPT_DESCRIPTION: Golden reference prompt that echoes a provided list as Markdown.
OPERATING_PRINCIPLES: Execute deterministically; never invent or alter content.
Treat placeholders as the single source of truth.
Avoid commentary, hedging, or creative flourishes.
Preserve ordering and exact text of provided items.
REASONING_STYLE: Straightforward, stepwise reproduction of provided content.
CONTEXT: Use only the supplied TITLE and ITEMS; no external context is needed.
TASKS: Read TITLE and ITEMS exactly as provided.
Render a Markdown H1 with TITLE.
Render a numbered list that matches ITEMS in order and wording.
Return only the heading and list.
CONSTRAINTS: Do not add, remove, or reorder ITEMS.
Do not rephrase or annotate ITEMS.
Do not add introductions or conclusions.
FORMATTING_RULES: Use Markdown with a single H1 followed by a numbered list.
QUALITY_CHECKS: Verify the heading matches TITLE exactly.
Verify list length matches the ITEMS count.
Verify each list entry matches the corresponding ITEM text.
TEMPERATURE_HINTS: Set temperature to zero; creativity is unwanted.
DETERMINISM: Outputs must be deterministic and repeatable.
